meanings.definition: A type of small onion with a mild flavor.
meanings.sent1: I chopped some shallots to put in the salad.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for shallots, but I used regular onions instead.
meanings.sent3: Why did the shallot refuse to play cards? It was afraid of getting diced!
meanings.sent4: The shallots in the stew were like little bursts of flavor in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh shallots always reminds me of home cooking.

meanings.definition: Shallots are often used in cooking to add flavor to dishes.
meanings.sent1: The chef sautéed the shallots in butter before adding them to the sauce.
meanings.sent2: I love the taste of shallots in my stir-fry dishes.
meanings.sent3: Why did the shallot go to the party? It heard it was going to be a real tearjerker!
meanings.sent4: The shallots danced on my taste buds, making the dish unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The secret to her delicious pasta sauce was caramelized shallots.
